text: "Peru", is an afrobeats song by Nigerian singer Fireboy DML. It was released on 20 July 2021. It is from Fireboy DML's album, Playboy. On 23 December 2021, a reworked version of "Peru" was released, in collaboration with British singer-songwriter Ed Sheeran. ==References== Category:2021 songs Category:Ed Sheeran songs
title: Peru (song)
